Comment: The stock item's ID code in EXO Business.
The supplier's ID code for the stock item.
The supplier's description for the stock item.
The supplier's latest cost for the stock item.
The ID number of the supplier (Creditor) account.
The Minimum Order Quantity for the stock item.
The Qty per Pack when purchasing the stock item from the supplier.
The Pack Cost when purchasing the stock item from the supplier.
An optional reference code for the pack.
The date when the record was last updated (not set automatically - it must be specified on the Alternate Suppliers / Stock Codes window).
The percentage discount when purchasing the stock item from the supplier.
